name: Stuck On You
description:
Stuck On You was designed and developed in 7 days by Kevin W. Hoffman inspired by the "Stronger Together" theme for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.

Credits
  • Game Design & Development by @kevinwhoffman
  • Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
  • Sound FX from Dustyroom Casual Game Sound - One Shot SFX Pack
  • Keyboard icons from Font Awesome
